description: HTML file for a web-based database visualizer UI, providing interfaces for selecting databases, viewing tables, and displaying data in a tabular format with interactive features.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by re-fetching data from the API.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects and long text.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better visibility.
